attributes.action: Scrap the Road Transport Directive, as there is already adequate legislation which limits the hours that LGV and PSV drivers can work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Come on  Mr Blair, lets review the Road Transport Directive, with a view to abolishing it in favour of the already rigid EU Drivers Hours Regulations.

It is totally unfair to expect vocational drivers to work within two sets of regulations.

Please let common sense prevail.
